title: Help us track down some elusive bugs
body:
Hey all,

We're tracking a few nasty and elusive bugs with the client update beta. With your help we can track down and squash these faster. Please take a look at the three bugs below and comment if you have experienced them while using the updated client.

If possible, please take a few minutes to share your logs with us. [Here's how.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/231536768-Updated-Client-Known-Issues)

**1-(Mastery Freeze):** Sometimes players are unable to edit masteries during champ select. 

If you've experienced this, could you please specify when you're seeing this? (Champ select/Collection/Profile etc.) Were you clicking or using the mouse wheel? Were you spamming clicks or doing anything unusual?

**2-(Unable to add mastery page):** Sometimes players are unable to add a new mastery page in the collection tab.

If possible, what was your network connection when you experienced this? Were you having an outage? Did you get disconnected soon after experiencing this? 

**3-(Missing runes): Some players are reporting that they're missing runes from their **

Make sure your rune tier boxes are checked. Are the runes missing on all pages or a specific page?

For the unable to edit masteries one (1).
You'll open up your page and it'll be unresponsive.  It's during champ select.

When you open it you cannot shift points at all.
You need to clear the page and re-add all the points.  Clearing a single mastery tree is grayed out or unresponsive.

Sometimes if you edit a page and save it "saves" but doesn't actually save, leading to the situation where you'll end up with a different Keystone/set of masteries than the one you edited, but after the game if you check collection it shows as the post-edited masteries (the ones you changed it to.)

If you guys need logs from a game I know exactly which game it was and can send them to you in a zip folder.
(I sent one set of logs in a bug tool report but was unsure if I sent the log type you needed)
It was a game where I ended up with Windspeaker's Blessing on Udyr in ARAM if that helps you find the report.

I posted this in the Report a Bug section of the boards and was told to copy pasta it here so here I am.

1-(Mastery Freeze): Sometimes players are unable to edit masteries during champ select.

Currently only happens during Champion Select, also comes with the nasty "can't see what you changed your masteries to" problem with it (to clarify: deselecting a mastery, or trying to select another mastery of the same tier shows no action was taken).

After I updated to the Alpha client, I noticed that my rune pages and mastery pages disappeared and had not deleted any of them. I had about 5 mastery pages and they disappeared. I also had two rune pages but when I updated I had one left and when I logged on a few days ago  I had none.
HOW ABOUT THE CLIENT RANDOMLY RESETTING IN GAME SETTINGS.

> 3-(Missing runes): Some players are reporting that they're missing runes from their

From their where? From their rune collection? From the store?

(1) Happens when editing a mastery page while searching for a match which you accept while still editing. Also happens when editing a mastery page in champ select when champ select cancels. Doesn't persist after closing and relaunching the client.

(3) Runes vanish and/or duplicate. Happens when removing runes from a rune page, I edit quickly so maybe clicking fast contributes. I've a good connection and 42 latency in game, but editing runes quickly seems to cause some lag and a little bit ago gave a weird connection error that I've not seen before. The client remained open while it reloaded my runes and friend bar. I've had the vanished runes before without an error/reconnection, but the below pictures are from after the above error. The error only showed for 15~ seconds so I didn't capture it and don't recall what it read. Doesn't persist after closing and relaunching the client.
